imdb.plot outline: In the wake of 'JEROTIS,' a viral epidemic, Triglobal Industries knowingly conducts a series of illegal human experiments, actively searching for a plan of treatment. Gary Parker, a loving father and novice fighter, falls prey to such experiments, affixed with an electronic device that must remain charged in order to keep him alive. Every form of treatment has its side effects, and some may prove useful as Gary attempts to escape from Triglobal's malicious intent.
imdb.title: Charged
plot: In wake of a viral epidemic, a loving fatherland novice fighter struggles to survive illegal experimentation in order to escape from the company that imprisoned him.

In the wake of 'JEROTIS,' a viral epidemic, Triglobal Industries knowingly conducts a series of illegal human experiments, actively searching for a plan of treatment. Gary Parker, a loving father and novice fighter, falls prey to such experiments, affixed with an electronic device that must remain charged in order to keep him alive. Every form of treatment has its side effects, and some may prove useful as Gary attempts to escape from Triglobal's malicious intent.
